content:
# It appears that the retrieval of the stone furnace entity was successful. Now, I will proceed to insert coal into the furnace for it to operate.

# Assuming I have successfully retrieved the furnace entity, I will insert 5 units of coal into it.

furnace_entity = get_entity_at(furnace_position)  # Retrieve the stone furnace entity at the specified position.
insert_item(furnace_entity, Prototype.Coal, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 units of coal into the furnace.

# Next, I will insert the iron ore into the furnace to begin the smelting process.
insert_item(furnace_entity, Prototype.IronOre, quantity=10)  # Insert all 10 units of iron ore.
